dir-section.heading: Banking
dir-section.p: There were 24 banks operating in Bosnia and Herzegovina at December 2022, of which 16 were in the Federation and eight were in Republika Srpska.

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Central Bank of Bosnia and Herzegovina

org-entry.content-note: named as Hypo Alpe-Adria-Bank d.d. in 2001; name changed as above in 2016
became Investment-Commercial Bank DD Zenica in 1990
ASA Banka Sarajevo d.d. from Dec. 2016

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Intesa Sanpaolo Banka d.d. Bosna i Hercegovina

org-entry.content-note: 94.8% owned by Privredna Banka Zagreb d.d.
named NLB Razvojna Banka a.d. in 2006; name changed as above in 2015

address.verbatim-address: 78000 Banja Luka, Kralja Alfonsa XIII 37 a

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Raiffeisen Bank d.d. Bosna i Hercegovina

org-entry.content-note: 99.99% owned by Raiffeisen SEE Region Holding GmbH (Austria)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Sparkasse Bank d.d. Bosna i Hercegovina,Sarajevo

org-entry.content-note: 99.3% owned by Zagrebačka Banka d.d. Zagreb (Croatia)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Banking Agency of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina
org-entry-head.alt-name: Agencija za Bankarstvo Federacije Bosne i Hercegovine

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Croatia Osiguranje d.d. Bosna i Hercegovina

role-group.role: Pres. of Exec. Bd and Gen. Dir

org-entry.content-note: owned by Grazer Wechselseitige Versicherung AG (Austria)
life and non-life, insurance and reinsurance

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Wiener Osiguranje Vienna Insurance Gropu a.d.

org-entry.content-note: 43.2% owned by Green Blue a.d. Banja Luka (Serbia)
